caseTitle: M/s Sprint Oil and Gas Services Pakistan FZC, Islamabad v. Oil and Gas Development Comapany Limted OGDCL, Islamabad
tagline: Only the High Court of the province which has enacted a provincial law can interpret it. A High Court’s jurisdiction under Article 199 may not be invoked when contracts have to be interpreted, nor when evidence is required to be recorded. In its writ jurisdiction a High Court also does not enter the realm of disputed facts.
